post.body: rescue me.
have a biscuit, you'll feel better.
figs!
I didn't know how much I wanted that biscuit until it was gone.
figs are back in a big way.
yay!
you don't remember anything about last night, do you? Just checking.
yay! Did you force him?
I think so.
not anymore.
cake.

yes, I worry about the profession.
ah, if the shoes are no good for me I guess I have no vested interest in him joining the hippies. We can only hope it's not too late.
I only want him to join the hippies so I can have his shoes.
join them.

you love that transporter man. You *love* him.
